communities.name: Gridcoin
communities.description: Gridcoin is dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.

communities.name: Longevist
communities.description: An overlay journal curating the world's most exciting longevity research. Presented in partnership with VitaDAO and DeSci Labs.

communities.name: MoonDAO
communities.description: MoonDAO is an international collective of people united by the mission of decentralizing access to space research and exploration.

communities.name: DeSci Foundation
communities.description: DeSci Foundation is dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.

communities.name: DeSci Labs
communities.description: DeSci Labs is a technology company focused on building open-source tools for the scientific community.

attestations.name: Scientific Manuscript
attestations.description: The research is formatted as a scientific manuscript

attestations.name: Open Data
attestations.description: The research data is available for review and reuse

attestations.name: Open Code
attestations.description: The research code is available for review and reuse

attestations.name: Ask Me Anything
attestations.description: The author is available to answer questions or receive feedback about the research

attestations.name: Reproducibility
attestations.description: The research was conducted in a way that allows others to verify the results

attestations.name: Big if True
attestations.description: The research is potentially groundbreaking and should be reviewed by the community

attestations.name: Commercializable
attestations.description: The research has potential commercial applications or has a commercialization plan

attestations.name: Used BOINC
attestations.description: The research was conducted using Berkeley Open Infrastructure for Network Computing

attestations.name: Used Folding@home
attestations.description: The research was conducted using Folding@home software, which uses the idle resources of personal computers to perform protein folding simulations

attestations.name: Used Rosetta@home
attestations.description: The research was conducted using Rosetta@home software, which uses the idle resources of personal computers to perform protein folding simulations

attestations.name: Space Science
attestations.description: The research is related to space science

attestations.name: Longevity Research
attestations.description: The research is related to longevity
